data.lyric:
[ti:Forever]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Post Malone/Clever]
[al:Changes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Forever - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)/Post Malone/Clever
[00:01.94]Lyrics by：Jason "Poo Bear" Boyd/Louis Bell/Bernard Harvey/Justin Bieber/Joshua Huie/Ali Darwish/Austin Post/Billy Walsh
[00:03.88]Composed by：Jason "Poo Bear" Boyd/Louis Bell/Bernard Harvey/Justin Bieber/Joshua Huie/Ali Darwish/Austin Post/Billy Walsh
[00:05.82]Could you be here with me forever ever ever
[00:09.47]Would you be here with me forever ever ever
[00:12.95]Wakin' up all alone ain't better better better
[00:16.41]Every time I go the wrong way you turn me back around
[00:19.67]Turn me back like woah-woah woah-woah oh-oh-oh
[00:24.56]Woah woah-woah forever ever ever ever
[00:30.05]Do you wanna look at me forever ever ever
[00:33.44]Yeah do you see us in Vegas pushin' that Monte Carlo
[00:37.67]Bet that money on baby bet she don't leave me oh no
[00:40.91]See them he wears in the desert look like a lake in the sand
[00:44.31]Would you watch the sun burn out with me forever ever ever ever
[00:49.33]You still intimidate me keep me up on my toes now
[00:52.83]Better man what you made me made me aware of what I was missin'
[00:57.62]Been missin' the way you give me envision babe
[01:01.19]Never thought I'd settle down I cannot lie to myself
[01:05.54]I was busy focusin' on bein' by myself
[01:08.68]Set my feelings to the side they all got dusty on the shelf
[01:12.41]You wiped them down when I had nothin' left
[01:14.47]Could you be here with me forever ever ever
[01:18.04]Would you be here with me forever ever ever
[01:21.46]Wakin' up all alone ain't better better better
[01:24.89]Every time I go the wrong way you turn me back around
[01:28.23]Turn me back like woah-woah woah-woah oh-oh-oh
[01:33.13]Woah woah-woah forever ever ever ever
[01:38.65]Do you wanna look at me forever ever ever
[01:42.08]When you asked me if I cheated I said never
[01:44.84]No way
[01:45.43]What are you willing to do to stay together
[01:48.39]'Gether
[01:48.76]How many times we gonna break up 'fore the summer
[01:52.12]How many times you gonna try to call my mother
[01:55.10]Brrr-brrr
[01:55.69]Girl you're killin' me I don't wanna act like I can fix this
[01:59.56]Fix it fix it
[02:00.48]I don't wanna be the one that's changed since Texas
[02:03.94]Currency it comes so naturally but I can't buy your love
[02:09.42]Could you be here with me forever ever ever
[02:13.01]Would you be here with me forever ever ever
[02:16.39]Wakin' up all alone ain't better better better
[02:19.77]Every time I go the wrong way you turn me back around
[02:23.33]Turn me back like woah-woah woah-woah oh-oh-oh
[02:27.65]Woah woah-woah forever ever ever ever
[02:33.52]Do you wanna look at me forever ever ever
[02:36.75]I promise I'm gonna love you 'til my dying day
[02:39.94]You wake up your face in my chest your favorite hiding place
[02:43.57]The roof is gone as we're driving out the private gate
[02:46.93]Countin' the stars with our last name on the license plate
[02:50.48]Woah oh oh oh
[02:51.83]I lied to myself 'bout trying to be here all alone
[02:55.01]When I leave it's bye for now it's just never bye for long
[02:58.31]Set my feelings aside let's settle down
[03:00.89]Every time I go the wrong way you turn me back around
[03:04.27]Turn me back like woah-woah woah-woah oh-oh-oh
[03:09.06]Woah woah-woah forever ever ever ever
[03:14.67]Do you wanna look at me forever ever ever
[03:17.95]Would you be here with me forever ever ever
[03:21.45]Would you be here with me forever ever ever
[03:24.90]Wakin' up all alone ain't better better better
[03:28.35]Every time I go the wrong way you turn me back around
data.trans:
[ti:Forever]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Post Malone/Clever]
[al:Changes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.94]//
[00:03.88]//
[00:05.82]你能否永远陪着我
[00:09.47]你是否愿意永远在我身边
[00:12.95]独自醒来并不好受
[00:16.41]每当我误入歧途 你都会让我重回正轨
[00:19.67]让我重回正轨
[00:24.56]永不分离
[00:30.05]你是否愿意永远注视着我
[00:33.44]你是否看见我们在拉斯维加斯尽情挥霍
[00:37.67]孤注一掷 我敢打赌她不会离我而去
[00:40.91]全都看在眼里 他在沙漠里现身 仿佛是沙漠里的一汪湖水
[00:44.31]你是否愿意永远陪我欣赏落日余晖
[00:49.33]你让我提心吊胆 让我保持警觉
[00:52.83]你让我变得无可挑剔 让我意识到我错过的一切
[00:57.62]宝贝 我想念你让我充满期待的模样
[01:01.19]我从未想过我会安定下来 我无法自欺欺人
[01:05.54]我自以为是 总想着独处
[01:08.68]我心灰意冷 不再显露我的喜怒哀乐
[01:12.41]当我一无所有时 你拂去尘埃
[01:14.47]你能否永远陪着我
[01:18.04]你是否愿意永远在我身边
[01:21.46]独自醒来并不好受
[01:24.89]每当我误入歧途 你都会让我重回正轨
[01:28.23]让我重回正轨
[01:33.13]永不分离
[01:38.65]你是否愿意永远注视着我
[01:42.08]当你问我我是否背弃誓言 我说永远不会
[01:44.84]绝不可能
[01:45.43]只要能和我在一起 你是否愿意付出一切
[01:48.39]//
[01:48.76]夏天到来以前 我们还要分分合合吗
[01:52.12]你还要给我妈妈打多少次电话
[01:55.10]//
[01:55.69]女孩 你让我饱受折磨 我不想装作我若无其事
[01:59.56]//
[02:00.48]从得克萨斯州出发 我不愿改变一分一毫
[02:03.94]挣钱 易如反掌 可我无法挽回你的爱
[02:09.42]你能否永远陪着我
[02:13.01]你是否愿意永远在我身边
[02:16.39]独自醒来并不好受
[02:19.77]每当我误入歧途 你都会让我重回正轨
[02:23.33]让我重回正轨
[02:27.65]永不分离
[02:33.52]你是否愿意永远注视着我
[02:36.75]我保证我会永远爱你 矢志不渝
[02:39.94]醒来时 你的脸庞靠在我的胸膛上 这是你最喜欢的地方
[02:43.57]当我们驾车驶出家门 放下车篷 豁然开朗
[02:46.93]坐在带有我们姓氏车牌号的车上细数繁星
[02:50.48]//
[02:51.83]我自欺欺人 我想独自一人
[02:55.01]当我离开 这只是短暂的告别而不是永别
[02:58.31]抛下心中的顾虑 让我们安定下来
[03:00.89]每当我误入歧途 你都会让我重回正轨
[03:04.27]让我重回正轨
[03:09.06]永不分离
[03:14.67]你是否愿意永远注视着我
[03:17.95]你是否愿意永远在我身边
[03:21.45]你是否愿意永远在我身边
[03:24.90]独自醒来并不好受
[03:28.35]每当我误入歧途 你都会让我重回正轨
